turns.context: One morning my mother came by to get my daughter for school, and told me she saw that my daughter's cat had been hit on the road. He was dead, and I had to tell my daughter. She loved her cat so much, it was very difficult.

turns.context: Once I was ashamed b/c my husband asked me not to tell my mom that he was actually busy when she needed his help with something.  I ended up telling her and he found out and was pretty upset with me.

turns.context: There was a neighbor I never had met that called my son a derogatory name one time when he was riding his bike. She didn't like that he got in her yard a little bit when he went around the corner and was very ugly to him, and he was only 10 years old at the time.

dialogue_history.utterance: There was a back neighbor that called my 10 year old son a ugly name one time, simply because he entered her yard slightly when he rode around the corner.!

turns.context: I am continually value *health*. Too often, I see people either squandering it or not appreciating it until it's gone.

dialogue_history.utterance: I have a hard time having confidence in myself but when I got married and I had my hair and makeup done I felt like I was beautiful!  I had so much confidence in myself that day and it was great!

turns.context: I have to say that at my wedding I felt the most confident I have ever felt.  I felt beautiful and ready to conquer the world!

dialogue_history.utterance: I have a hard time having confidence in myself but when I got married and I had my hair and makeup done I felt like I was beautiful!  I had so much confidence in myself that day and it was great!
I bet you were beautiful on that day. :) I hope that confidence has carried on since then!
I really try but it's hard to replicate that day for sure.

turns.context: My husband and I both work for ourselves, so as the end of the month approaches, we can sometimes feel a little worried about bringing in the funds we need.

dialogue_history.utterance: My husband and I both work for ourselves -- a blessing and a curse at times, since it can be tough to determine a "regular" income.

turns.context: My husband and I both work for ourselves, so as the end of the month approaches, we can sometimes feel a little worried about bringing in the funds we need.

dialogue_history.utterance: My husband and I both work for ourselves -- a blessing and a curse at times, since it can be tough to determine a "regular" income.
I bet it's tough. A regular income is nice but the freedom you get from working for yourself is better.
We found a pretty good balance in that I have a part-time job that I *love* -- and that comes with benefits like insurance. That's a big worry addressed, right there.

turns.context: Once, I had plans to meet up with an old flame. I got to the spot and spotted her from across the room. She gave me a big hug, and then introduced me to her new boyfriend.

dialogue_history.utterance: I met up with an old flame recently, didn't go how I expected

turns.context: Once, I had plans to meet up with an old flame. I got to the spot and spotted her from across the room. She gave me a big hug, and then introduced me to her new boyfriend.

dialogue_history.utterance: I met up with an old flame recently, didn't go how I expected
Oh ya? What happened?? I'm intrigued
Well, right after she gave me a big hug, she introduced me to her new boyfriend.

turns.context: I recently booked our vacation accommodations in Florida, which we are going to in a few weeks. We have a large beachfront condo and I can't wait!

dialogue_history.utterance: My family and I are going on vacation in a few weeks. We rented a largo beachfront condo and I can't wait!

turns.context: I recently booked our vacation accommodations in Florida, which we are going to in a few weeks. We have a large beachfront condo and I can't wait!

dialogue_history.utterance: My family and I are going on vacation in a few weeks. We rented a largo beachfront condo and I can't wait!
OH I love the beach!!  Which beach are you going to go to?
We are going to be staying at Miramar Beach in Florida, about an hour Panama City Beach. The view is amazing from our balcony and we are so ready!

turns.context: My friend Maria and I had plans for brunch. We were supposed to meet at 11, but she didn't even call me till 3. I had work at 5, so the day was a waste.

dialogue_history.utterance: I was supposed to go for brunch with my friend Maria the other day. At least that was the plan.

turns.context: My friend Maria and I had plans for brunch. We were supposed to meet at 11, but she didn't even call me till 3. I had work at 5, so the day was a waste.

dialogue_history.utterance: I was supposed to go for brunch with my friend Maria the other day. At least that was the plan.
Why didn't you go?
Well, we had initially agreed to meet at 11. Wouldn't you know it, she didn't end up returning my text until 3PM!

turns.context: Once I was super afraid b/c there was this guys following me and my mom at this grocery store.  I wasn't sure what to do about the situation so I told the manager at the store and he had someone walk me and my mom out to my car so we would be safe.

dialogue_history.utterance: Me and my mom were at this grocery store recently and this guy started following us outside the store and then again inside the store it was so scary!

turns.context: Once I was super afraid b/c there was this guys following me and my mom at this grocery store.  I wasn't sure what to do about the situation so I told the manager at the store and he had someone walk me and my mom out to my car so we would be safe.

dialogue_history.utterance: Me and my mom were at this grocery store recently and this guy started following us outside the store and then again inside the store it was so scary!
Did he do anything to you and your mom?
Well I knew he was following us and so I asked the manager to walk us out to the car and when he did we saw the guy come out again from between the two buildings b/c he was waiting on us.  so scary!

turns.context: I waited at a restaurant for 30 minutes before I called and left my girlfriend an angry voicemail. Turns out she had been in a car crash, and was talking to the Police Officer.

dialogue_history.utterance: Did I tell you what happened with Li the other night? Boy do I feel dumb.

turns.context: I waited at a restaurant for 30 minutes before I called and left my girlfriend an angry voicemail. Turns out she had been in a car crash, and was talking to the Police Officer.

dialogue_history.utterance: Did I tell you what happened with Li the other night? Boy do I feel dumb.
No, you didn't tell me! What happened?

She's 45 minutes late to our anniversary dinner. I don't know what happened to me but I called and left an angry message. Turns out, she had gotten T-boned at an intersection and was talking to the Police Officer when I called!

turns.context: I went to my girlfriend's work party. I ended up drinking too much with her co-workers. She made me feel better when we got home, and blamed it on one guy in particular.

dialogue_history.utterance: Ugh! I looked like such a fool at my girlfriend's work party!

turns.context: I went to my girlfriend's work party. I ended up drinking too much with her co-workers. She made me feel better when we got home, and blamed it on one guy in particular.

dialogue_history.utterance: Ugh! I looked like such a fool at my girlfriend's work party!
What happened?

Well, I ended up having way too much to drink. One of her co-workers had a bottle of Fireball (gross I KNOW) and was making everybody do shots. I didn't want to look foolish, so I had... well too many.

turns.context: I had tickets to see Jay-Z and Beyonce at an outdoor venue. The big day came, and tropical storm hit. Not only did the concert get rained out, but no one got a refund.

dialogue_history.utterance: Did I tell you what happened with the concert I was supposed to go to Saturday?

turns.context: I had tickets to see Jay-Z and Beyonce at an outdoor venue. The big day came, and tropical storm hit. Not only did the concert get rained out, but no one got a refund.

dialogue_history.utterance: Did I tell you what happened with the concert I was supposed to go to Saturday?
No, what happened?
Well first of all, it wasn't just any concert - it was Jay-Z and Beyonce! AND IT GOT RAINED OUT!

turns.context: I came home from vacation and my long lost friend was sleeping on my couch. We all thought he had died in a monsoon in Thailand.

dialogue_history.utterance: You are never going to guess who was sleeping on the couch when I got home from New York...

turns.context: I came home from vacation and my long lost friend was sleeping on my couch. We all thought he had died in a monsoon in Thailand.

dialogue_history.utterance: You are never going to guess who was sleeping on the couch when I got home from New York...
Who, tell me!
My friend Benny! The one we all thought died in a monsoon in Thailand!

turns.context: My husband came home from shopping a couple days before Mother's Day and he gave me some unexpected gifts. He had got me a beautiful diamond ring, along with some other wonderful gifts!

dialogue_history.utterance: Recently, my husband came home from grocery shopping and had gifts for me for Mother's Day. He had a beautiful diamond ring and other lovely gifts, it was very unexpected!

turns.context: My husband came home from shopping a couple days before Mother's Day and he gave me some unexpected gifts. He had got me a beautiful diamond ring, along with some other wonderful gifts!

dialogue_history.utterance: Recently, my husband came home from grocery shopping and had gifts for me for Mother's Day. He had a beautiful diamond ring and other lovely gifts, it was very unexpected!
That is very nice gift. Did you bought anything for him for Father's day?
I did! I also gave him unexpected gifts and he was super happy. I was very touched by him being so thoughtful!

turns.context: I went in for a third interview at a company considering me. The owner was in attendance, and I could see he was impressed with my portfolio. They told me they still were looking at two other candidates, but I bet I'll get an offer tonight or tomorrow.

dialogue_history.utterance: I know I shouldn't count my chicks before they hatch, but I'm feeling pretty good after that interview today!

turns.context: I went in for a third interview at a company considering me. The owner was in attendance, and I could see he was impressed with my portfolio. They told me they still were looking at two other candidates, but I bet I'll get an offer tonight or tomorrow.

dialogue_history.utterance: I know I shouldn't count my chicks before they hatch, but I'm feeling pretty good after that interview today!
Oh what job was the interview for?
This advertising company! The owner was there - you should have seen his face. My last freelance project was a real winner. Think I got it?

turns.context: I was at the World's Largest Pistachio when an armed man burst in to the gift shop. He was in a shootout with the Police, but he never acted like he was going to hurt us. I'm just happy to be alive.

dialogue_history.utterance: Did I ever tell you about the time I 'got taken hostage'?

turns.context: I was at the World's Largest Pistachio when an armed man burst in to the gift shop. He was in a shootout with the Police, but he never acted like he was going to hurt us. I'm just happy to be alive.

dialogue_history.utterance: Did I ever tell you about the time I 'got taken hostage'?
oh my are you really serious?

As a heart attack. It was me and Big C at the World's Largest Pistachio. All of the sudden we hear gunshots, and DiDi's still in the car. We ran in the building, and he comes flying in after us. He never pointed the gun at us, and we ended up running away when he was distracted. It's too crazy - I can't make this up. Just glad to be alive!

turns.context: I had a friend's boyfriend make a pass at me when I went to visit my friend. He actually kissed me, and this made me very upset. I couldn't believe the nerve!

dialogue_history.utterance: I went to visit a friend one day and her boyfriend made a pass at me. He actually suddenly kissed me, as I was waiting for my friend to return. I couldn't believe his nerve!

turns.context: I had a friend's boyfriend make a pass at me when I went to visit my friend. He actually kissed me, and this made me very upset. I couldn't believe the nerve!

dialogue_history.utterance: I went to visit a friend one day and her boyfriend made a pass at me. He actually suddenly kissed me, as I was waiting for my friend to return. I couldn't believe his nerve!
Oh no, what did you do?
I quietly pushed him away, as I didn't want my friend to hear. I was so shocked and upset, since he knew I wouldn't want to make a scene and took advantage.

turns.context: This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped working! We had to go all weekend without it, which lead to having to throw out a lot of food and some strong odors! It was Monday before we were able to get it repaired.

dialogue_history.utterance: This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped cooling! We had to go the weekend without it, and of course had to deal with some unpleasant smells and throw away a large amount of food! It wasn't a fun weekend for us!

turns.context: This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped working! We had to go all weekend without it, which lead to having to throw out a lot of food and some strong odors! It was Monday before we were able to get it repaired.

dialogue_history.utterance: This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped cooling! We had to go the weekend without it, and of course had to deal with some unpleasant smells and throw away a large amount of food! It wasn't a fun weekend for us!
Oh no, I hate when that happens. I can sympathize with you because thats happened to me twice! It's okay in the winter time and you can sort of keep your food fresh but not during the summer.
Yes, and of course we tried to call and have someone come out, but to no avail! You don't realize how much you rely on things like that until they aren't working!

turns.context: I felt bad recently because I was dishonest with my friend about her boyfriend. He had made a pass at me, but I never told her about it.

dialogue_history.utterance: I felt pretty bad when I was having girl talk with my friend and we were talking about our partners. Her boyfriend had made a pass at me, but I never told her about it.

turns.context: I felt bad recently because I was dishonest with my friend about her boyfriend. He had made a pass at me, but I never told her about it.

dialogue_history.utterance: I felt pretty bad when I was having girl talk with my friend and we were talking about our partners. Her boyfriend had made a pass at me, but I never told her about it.
Wao, you must fell weird about it! what you thinki to do about it?

I felt bad, but she wasn't working and taking care of her grandchild, and her boyfriend was the financial support. I knew it would really be hard on her if she found out, not to mention she really loves him.

turns.context: I hug my mom from behind, and it was not my mom

dialogue_history.utterance: I was at the mall and hug my mom and said to her: Time to go Mommy! and i wasnt her, can you imagine my reaction to it?

turns.context: I hug my mom from behind, and it was not my mom

dialogue_history.utterance: I was at the mall and hug my mom and said to her: Time to go Mommy! and i wasnt her, can you imagine my reaction to it?
Oh, I'm sure you were embarrassed! But, maybe you can laugh about it now?
Yes, totally but at the moment i felt like the stupidiest person on earth, didn't know were to hide! and my mom was watching

turns.context: I have a vacation condo in Florida at the beach reserved in a few weeks. It is right on the beach, with gorgeous ocean views and I can't wait to go.

dialogue_history.utterance: I am looking forward to going on vacation in a few weeks! We have a condo reserved on the beach, with fantastic ocean views. I'm ready!

turns.context: I have a vacation condo in Florida at the beach reserved in a few weeks. It is right on the beach, with gorgeous ocean views and I can't wait to go.

dialogue_history.utterance: I am looking forward to going on vacation in a few weeks! We have a condo reserved on the beach, with fantastic ocean views. I'm ready!
Ah, that sounds fantastic! Which ocean will you be enjoying?
Well, we are staying at Panama City Beach, so we're right there at the Gulf of Mexico.

turns.context: I was so proud of my 15 year old daughter. She was determined to work this summer, even with us telling her no one would hire her unless she was 16. She persevered and we were wrong -- she was hired at the first job she interviewed for!

dialogue_history.utterance: I am definitely a proud parent of our 15 year old -- she was determined to work this summer, and even with us saying no one would hire her until 16 -- she found a job!

turns.context: I was so proud of my 15 year old daughter. She was determined to work this summer, even with us telling her no one would hire her unless she was 16. She persevered and we were wrong -- she was hired at the first job she interviewed for!

dialogue_history.utterance: I am definitely a proud parent of our 15 year old -- she was determined to work this summer, and even with us saying no one would hire her until 16 -- she found a job!
Well, that's impressive! I can see why you are proud. Sounds like a hard working young lady!
That, and she's enjoying the independence of having her own money. Remember that? Making money that you truly could use for your *pleasure* (and not just necessities ?! ;-))

turns.context: I am annoyed by people who won't return their grocery carts, and just leave them in the parking lot!

dialogue_history.utterance: Okay, a silly pet peeve but one nonetheless -- when people just leave their grocery carts willy-nilly in the parking lot. No consideration for others or the people who work at the store!

turns.context: I am annoyed by people who won't return their grocery carts, and just leave them in the parking lot!

dialogue_history.utterance: Okay, a silly pet peeve but one nonetheless -- when people just leave their grocery carts willy-nilly in the parking lot. No consideration for others or the people who work at the store!
Absolutely I agree I always try to not even bring cart unless I have too many too carry.
Me too. And I will always make sure to at *least* put it in one of those cart corrals, if not walk it back up to the store. Hey -- extra exercise ;-)

turns.context: I wnet home, and my wife surpises me with a picture of our future baby.

dialogue_history.utterance: I came home, and my wife showed me a picture in 4d of our future baby, my heart speeded so fast!

turns.context: I wnet home, and my wife surpises me with a picture of our future baby.

dialogue_history.utterance: I came home, and my wife showed me a picture in 4d of our future baby, my heart speeded so fast!
oh wow. Do you know whether it will be a boy or girl yet?
We choose to wait! but the amount of happiness in my body is tremendous! never felt this way before.

turns.context: I love when I'm in the 'flow' doing what I'm doing -- whether it's speaking or doing large-scale visual capture of meetings.

dialogue_history.utterance: I love being in the 'flow' -- whether it's in speaking to a group of people or working to help facilitate meetings.

turns.context: I love when I'm in the 'flow' doing what I'm doing -- whether it's speaking or doing large-scale visual capture of meetings.

dialogue_history.utterance: I love being in the 'flow' -- whether it's in speaking to a group of people or working to help facilitate meetings.
What kind of work do you do?

I work with different organizations on strengthening their culture, and I do large-scale visual notetaking (also known as graphic recording). Are you familiar with that at all? (Not unusual NOT to be!)

turns.context: I am impressed by leaders who know it's best to surround themselves with people who are smarter/better/more experienced than themselves in some areas.

dialogue_history.utterance: I LOVE when leaders know that it actually *helps* them to be surrounded by strong people -- people they can learn from, that challenge them, and that in some ways could be considered 'better'.

turns.context: I am impressed by leaders who know it's best to surround themselves with people who are smarter/better/more experienced than themselves in some areas.

dialogue_history.utterance: I LOVE when leaders know that it actually *helps* them to be surrounded by strong people -- people they can learn from, that challenge them, and that in some ways could be considered 'better'.
I agree, its always nice to have people around you who are smarter in some areas.
It's just too many leaders want 'yes men' and/or people who feel non-threatening. It's a trap and a quick path to mediocrity, if not failure!

turns.context: I was so happy the day I learned I was pregnant with our first child!

dialogue_history.utterance: I'll always remember the day I learned I was pregnant with our first child -- Halloween in Chicago, and we were with friends at the Shedd Aquarium! I've loved baby belugas since ;-)

turns.context: I was so happy the day I learned I was pregnant with our first child!

dialogue_history.utterance: I'll always remember the day I learned I was pregnant with our first child -- Halloween in Chicago, and we were with friends at the Shedd Aquarium! I've loved baby belugas since ;-)
Baby belugas are cute, but not as cute as your baby!
Ha! True that ;-) That's also the year that A Bug's Life came out, and we always thought of our young one as "Dot", the spunky little girl ant in the movie.

turns.context: I came in the room on mother's day. I expected a couple of gifts not balloons, tons of gifts and flowers. The gifts were so heartfelt too.

dialogue_history.utterance: This mother's day was amazing! I got so much more than expected and it was all so heartfelt.

turns.context: I came in the room on mother's day. I expected a couple of gifts not balloons, tons of gifts and flowers. The gifts were so heartfelt too.

dialogue_history.utterance: This mother's day was amazing! I got so much more than expected and it was all so heartfelt.
That is great!! Sometimes we mom's get a bit forgotten, so to have an entire day where we are just loved is such a great feeling.
Yes, definitely! I actually cried a few times because of how much thought went into each gift and what was written in the cards.

turns.context: I had an interview for my dream job. I felt sure I would get it, but I didn't in the end.

dialogue_history.utterance: That's too bad. What do you think went wrong?

turns.context: I had an interview for my dream job. I felt sure I would get it, but I didn't in the end.

dialogue_history.utterance: That's too bad. What do you think went wrong?
I am not sure, it was pretty random
Did they give you any feedback?

turns.context: I had an interview for my dream job. I felt sure I would get it, but I didn't in the end.

dialogue_history.utterance: That's too bad. What do you think went wrong?
I am not sure, it was pretty random
Did they give you any feedback?
No, nothing at all
That is a shame, you need to learn from your mistakes.

turns.context: I just found out that my sister and her husband are pregnant. They are great people and I hope they will be amazing parents!

dialogue_history.utterance: So my sister told us a couple weeks ago she was pregnant. Her and her husband are so excited. I hope they have an amazing 9 months and then an amazing time raising the baby.

turns.context: I just found out that my sister and her husband are pregnant. They are great people and I hope they will be amazing parents!

dialogue_history.utterance: So my sister told us a couple weeks ago she was pregnant. Her and her husband are so excited. I hope they have an amazing 9 months and then an amazing time raising the baby.
That is exciting news!  I bet you were so surprised!
I was very surprised. She didn't tell a single person they were trying for a baby. Just announced it on the 4th of July

turns.context: I was excited to go biking today, but then it was raining.

dialogue_history.utterance: Oh no, what did you do instead? Did you watch Netflix?

I do watch Netflix sometimes.  Do you watch?

dialogue_history.utterance: Oh no, what did you do instead? Did you watch Netflix?
I do watch Netflix sometimes.  Do you watch?
Yes, I do. I recently watched the series 'Dark.' It's the German one.
I haven't heard of that one.  What genre does it fall in?
It's a supernatural mystery type. I won't spoil the twist.

turns.context: One time I was going to a court hearing against my former place of employment to repeal a decision made to cancel my unemployment. I knew I would win because I had so much evidence against them and their shoddy work practices.

dialogue_history.utterance: I went to a court hearing for unemployment with my former employer, and I felt great about it since I was so prepared with all of the documents and everything I needed to show the court I was in the right for quitting.

turns.context: One time I was going to a court hearing against my former place of employment to repeal a decision made to cancel my unemployment. I knew I would win because I had so much evidence against them and their shoddy work practices.

dialogue_history.utterance: I went to a court hearing for unemployment with my former employer, and I felt great about it since I was so prepared with all of the documents and everything I needed to show the court I was in the right for quitting.
Did it go your way?
Yes, I actually ended up winning it and they gave me 6 months of unemployment pay.

turns.context: Today no matter where I drove today the other drivers were terrible. They kept cutting me off and not signaling among other things.

dialogue_history.utterance: Today traffic was horrible and was so frustrating!

turns.context: Today no matter where I drove today the other drivers were terrible. They kept cutting me off and not signaling among other things.

dialogue_history.utterance: Today traffic was horrible and was so frustrating!
I hate traffic too, it makes me angry
Yes! People were constantly cutting me off, not signalling and slamming on their brakes

turns.context: When I was 10 years old I watched the film 'The Grudge' and was so scared of the dark that I couldn't navigate around my own house.

dialogue_history.utterance: The grudge scared me when I was 10 to which I couldn't navigate my own house.

turns.context: When I was 10 years old I watched the film 'The Grudge' and was so scared of the dark that I couldn't navigate around my own house.

dialogue_history.utterance: The grudge scared me when I was 10 to which I couldn't navigate my own house.
I can imagine! That was a terrifying movie.
And yet I still felt as if I had to see the sequels when they came out too.

turns.context: My friend ended up passing her semester with flying colors, despite the fact that she has 2 children and didn't do well in high school. She pushed hard to overcome her circumstances.

dialogue_history.utterance: My best friend did amazing in school, despite having 2 children and not doing great academically in school. She ended up getting honors in her first 2 semesters.

turns.context: My friend ended up passing her semester with flying colors, despite the fact that she has 2 children and didn't do well in high school. She pushed hard to overcome her circumstances.

dialogue_history.utterance: My best friend did amazing in school, despite having 2 children and not doing great academically in school. She ended up getting honors in her first 2 semesters.
She sounds like a person with great ability. Great choice of friend.
She has been my friend for 19 years. She pushes me to do better too.

turns.context: I decided I wanted a puppy and put out the word I was looking for one. On the way to get my new puppy after getting a call about one I was so thrilled.

dialogue_history.utterance: I decided a few months I was ready for a puppy, so I put the word out

turns.context: I decided I wanted a puppy and put out the word I was looking for one. On the way to get my new puppy after getting a call about one I was so thrilled.

dialogue_history.utterance: I decided a few months I was ready for a puppy, so I put the word out
Put what word? You mean published the info?
Basically, yes. I made a classified ad. I was beyond thrilled after getting a call to get one!

turns.context: I was really jealous of my best friend, who is a surgeon, and makes six figures a year, while I am at half that.

dialogue_history.utterance: My friend is a surgeon and we were discussing salary. He easily makes 200,000 a year and he is only 32. It's crazy and I was jealous of him.

turns.context: I was really jealous of my best friend, who is a surgeon, and makes six figures a year, while I am at half that.

dialogue_history.utterance: My friend is a surgeon and we were discussing salary. He easily makes 200,000 a year and he is only 32. It's crazy and I was jealous of him.
You shouldn't, because that is a very stressful job
Yeah, that's a good point. I also realized he has a high malpractice insurance, and is on call a lot.

turns.context: I talked with my student adviser the other day. I didn't realize I only had 7 months until I graduate and start my new career.

dialogue_history.utterance: I am in college and I was talking to my student adviser the other day about the future

turns.context: I talked with my student adviser the other day. I didn't realize I only had 7 months until I graduate and start my new career.

dialogue_history.utterance: I am in college and I was talking to my student adviser the other day about the future
Really? Do you know what you want to do when you graduate? I know sometimes it's tough to settle on a path.
I want to be one to run the office part of a physicians practice but that isn't set in stone. I am thrilled to start my new career path

turns.context: I have a dog that lives near us and his owner never picks up his poop. It makes me feel sick!

dialogue_history.utterance: That is disgusting! What can you do about it?

turns.context: I have a dog that lives near us and his owner never picks up his poop. It makes me feel sick!

dialogue_history.utterance: That is disgusting! What can you do about it?
I'm not sure. What would you do?

turns.context: When I was kicked out of my step parent's house for no reason, my best friend immediately took me in. I was so thankful for that opportunity.

dialogue_history.utterance: One time when I was kicked out of the place I was staying at, my best friend immediately told me I could stay with her until I got on my feet.

turns.context: When I was kicked out of my step parent's house for no reason, my best friend immediately took me in. I was so thankful for that opportunity.

dialogue_history.utterance: One time when I was kicked out of the place I was staying at, my best friend immediately told me I could stay with her until I got on my feet.

I stayed with her for about a year until I got my own apartment. We are getting an apartment together in a few months.

turns.context: When I was kicked out of my step parent's house for no reason, my best friend immediately took me in. I was so thankful for that opportunity.

dialogue_history.utterance: One time when I was kicked out of the place I was staying at, my best friend immediately told me I could stay with her until I got on my feet.

So exciting! It can be fun to have a roommate
She also has 2 daughters, 2 and 7, and a few crested geckos too so I'll have a bunch of roommates.

turns.context: Last week when I heard about Toys r us closing it made me think of other memories from my childhood. I started reminiscing about the toys, music, games and so much more

dialogue_history.utterance: Last week when Toys R Us closed it really made me start thinking of the 90s and my childhood

turns.context: Last week when I heard about Toys r us closing it made me think of other memories from my childhood. I started reminiscing about the toys, music, games and so much more

Yes! THAT I feel good about! Making a point to use it as an opportunity to talk. I've definitely used it when it comes to the way others might act -- emphasizing that it's not about *them*, it's really about the person and where they're at.

turns.context: Sometimes I look back to my childhood and I miss when things were more simple, like when I would ride around my neighborhood all day with my friends. dialogue_history.utterance: Those were simpler times, I wish I could go back and relive those days!

turns.context: I felt like I was on top of the world when I won the science fair in middle school. No better feeling than that for a small child.

turns.context: I felt like I was on top of the world when I won the science fair in middle school. No better feeling than that for a small child.

dialogue_history.utterance: I felt like I was on top of the world when I won the science fair in middle school. No better feeling than that for a small child.
Congrats! That would be really exciting. What was your project?

My project was to show what farm poop produced the most gas when it decomposed. I put the poop in a bottle with a balloon on top. Whatever balloon grew the largest, was the one that released the most gas.

turns.context: Having a healthy baby

dialogue_history.utterance: When I was pregnant, I felt ill until it was over. The doctors were worried that something was wrong with the baby.

turns.context: Having a healthy baby

dialogue_history.utterance: When I was pregnant, I felt ill until it was over. The doctors were worried that something was wrong with the baby.
Oh no! I'm not sure how all that works, but I thought that was fairly normal for a pregnant woman.

Usually the sickness stops within the first few months, so the fact that I fell ill so much was worrisome. Despite it all, I had a healthy, bouncing baby boy. I never have felt more grateful in my life.

turns.context: Felt helpless when my dog passed away.

turns.context: Felt helpless when my dog passed away.

She was 14. I got her when she was a puppy. Even though the situation was rough, I'm grateful for all the years we did get to spend together.

dialogue_history.utterance: I was on an airplane last week, and someone's baby would not stop crying. I know it isn't right to be upset about such things, but it really bothered me.

dialogue_history.utterance: I was on an airplane last week, and someone's baby would not stop crying. I know it isn't right to be upset about such things, but it really bothered me.

I tried to think about that, but I was still aggravated. On the plus side, at least I was self aware that it was somewhat irrational.

turns.context: Once when I was in college this guy that I really didn't like more than a friend asked me on a date to go get some ice cream.

dialogue_history.utterance: Once in college this guy I was just friends with asked me out to get ice cream.  I could tell he really liked me and I didn't want to lead him on so I told him I had a headache.  I know that he knew I was lying and I still feel guilty to this day about that!

turns.context: Once when I was in college this guy that I really didn't like more than a friend asked me on a date to go get some ice cream.

dialogue_history.utterance: Once in college this guy I was just friends with asked me out to get ice cream.  I could tell he really liked me and I didn't want to lead him on so I told him I had a headache.  I know that he knew I was lying and I still feel guilty to this day about that!
yeah that's tough. But can you imagine how bad you might feel if he had a REALLY good time on the date and really thought things were going somewhere with the two of you?
Yes, I know thats what I was thinking.  I just don't know if I should have said the truth that I didn't like him that way instead of lying and saying I had a headache.

turns.context: Last week I had Thai food for lunch, and it didn't sit well with my stomach. I had some explosive issues later in the day at work, and the bathroom was near all of my coworkers' cubicles. Needless to say, the stench ended the workday a little early.

turns.context: Not long ago we had a storm that was horrible. Couldn't even see 5 feet outside the windows. The next thing we know all of our phones went off telling us to seek shelter while a tornado went by.

dialogue_history.utterance: Not long ago we had a horrible storm come through. You could barely see 5 feet outside the window.

turns.context: I have Lupus so I am not able to get out of the house much b/c I am so sick.  It makes me really lonely b/c I don't have many friends since I am not able to go out and hang out.

dialogue_history.utterance: I have a disease called Lupus.  Because I am so sick from this it causes me to lose a lot of friends.  I am not able to go out and hang out like I used to because I am just too sick to get out.  It makes me lonely.

turns.context: I have Lupus so I am not able to get out of the house much b/c I am so sick.  It makes me really lonely b/c I don't have many friends since I am not able to go out and hang out.

dialogue_history.utterance: I have a disease called Lupus.  Because I am so sick from this it causes me to lose a lot of friends.  I am not able to go out and hang out like I used to because I am just too sick to get out.  It makes me lonely.
That's really sad. Is there a cure for Lupus?
No unfortunately there isn't.  You can sometimes go into remission with really powerful drugs but that isn't guaranteed.

Yes, but when we were younger -- he didn't really understand. And truly, it was more about my own insecurities than about him, you know? As I grew more into myself, the jealousy loosened its hold.

turns.context: I used to live in California. Early one morning we had a smallish earthquake. It made me realize I had not put together an emergency package, so I immediately did so. Never hurts to be ready for the Big One!

dialogue_history.utterance: Since that earthquake in the early hours of the morning I realized how badly off I would be if I didn't get an emergency packet together. So that's what I did - cash, water, important documents, a change of clothing.

wow, it must have been quite an experience
It was enough to wake me, but not the cat, lol. It just made me realize that the Big One could happen any time and I would have been up the proverbial creek!

turns.context: My good friend just started work at a fantastic golf resort up in Michigan. I've seen it and it's stunning. Why can't I have a great job in a beautiful place with a view of Lake Michigan? Because I'm stuck here, that's why!

turns.context: This past winter I was sitting on my porch at 4am (couldn't sleep). Suddenly, out of the dark, came this tall bulky figure, dressed totally in black. My heart skipped as I tried to figure out what to do - I'm in a wheelchair.

dialogue_history.utterance: I had a rather unnerving experience this past winter. Being unable to sleep at 4am, I went outside for a cigarette (I live in an apartment complex). Suddenly, out of the darkness, appeared a tall bulky figure dressed in black. They were coming straight at me!

turns.context: This past winter I was sitting on my porch at 4am (couldn't sleep). Suddenly, out of the dark, came this tall bulky figure, dressed totally in black. My heart skipped as I tried to figure out what to do - I'm in a wheelchair.

dialogue_history.utterance: I had a rather unnerving experience this past winter. Being unable to sleep at 4am, I went outside for a cigarette (I live in an apartment complex). Suddenly, out of the darkness, appeared a tall bulky figure dressed in black. They were coming straight at me!
What did they or the person do to you?
Well, I'm in a wheelchair, so can't move too quickly. I just sat looking at them, trying to figure out whether I could reach the broom at the corner of the porch.

Actually, I did! I moved across the world to Doha, Qatar to teach for a couple of years. Even though my husband and daughter was with me, it was very hard to be away. Have you ever moved far away?

turns.context: When people honk in traffic

turns.context: My father unexpected passed away around 2 1/2 years ago. We never thought he would be leaving us this soon and it was very traumatic to me.

dialogue_history.utterance: My father passed away about 2 1/2 years ago. It was totally unexpected and really was very traumatic and hurtful to me. He was still quite young and my family and I had no idea he had a life threatening health issue.

turns.context: My father unexpected passed away around 2 1/2 years ago. We never thought he would be leaving us this soon and it was very traumatic to me.

dialogue_history.utterance: My father passed away about 2 1/2 years ago. It was totally unexpected and really was very traumatic and hurtful to me. He was still quite young and my family and I had no idea he had a life threatening health issue.
I am sorry to hear that, I hope you had some time together before hand
I was pretty close to my father and always lived close by. But, you always wish you had more time. But, the last words I said to him was that I loved him, and I'm grateful for that.

turns.context: There was this one time I was invited to my friend's birthday party.

we were walking in the front door and it had a glass door apparently but I didn't see it. It was a very clean door. LOL. Later on that night I won a door prize. which was pretty funny.

turns.context: I lost my temper with my daughter the other day and was a bit ill with her. I felt so bad that I had raised my voice and hurt her feelings.

dialogue_history.utterance: My daughter caught me in a bad mood the other day and was being a bit argumentative. I lost my temper, yelled and really hurt her feelings. I felt bad that it happened.

dialogue_history.utterance: My daughter caught me in a bad mood the other day and was being a bit argumentative. I lost my temper, yelled and really hurt her feelings. I felt bad that it happened.
Oh that sucks.  Those are the types of situations where you can't help it, but you know you did wrong the second after it's over.
Yes, I was already not in a good mood, and then it seemed like she just pushed the right button. But, I knew I shouldn't have done it as soon as I saw the look in her eyes, I felt very bad.

turns.context: An old man (appearing drunk at first) stopped me on the street, saying he was stranded and needed to go home. I got him a cab and gave the driver $20 to take him home.

dialogue_history.utterance: You never know what someone else is going through, and looks can be deceiving. Like this old man that seemed like any other drunk.

turns.context: An old man (appearing drunk at first) stopped me on the street, saying he was stranded and needed to go home. I got him a cab and gave the driver $20 to take him home.

dialogue_history.utterance: You never know what someone else is going through, and looks can be deceiving. Like this old man that seemed like any other drunk.
Yeah you can judge someone like that
It was hard to tell honestly, but it turned out the guy was lost and diabetic. He had lost track of his friends and had no way to get home, so I hailed him a cab and paid the driver $20.

dialogue_history.utterance: My family went on a road trip this week and had to stop at a gas station for the bathroom.

turns.context: While riding my bicycle to work, I was hit from behind by a woman in a car. She stopped, and even against my pleas (I was in shock), called for an ambulance.

dialogue_history.utterance: It sounds crazy to say, but even though I was hit by a car on my bicycle, it could have been much worse.

turns.context: While riding my bicycle to work, I was hit from behind by a woman in a car. She stopped, and even against my pleas (I was in shock), called for an ambulance.

dialogue_history.utterance: It sounds crazy to say, but even though I was hit by a car on my bicycle, it could have been much worse.
Are you okay?
I'm quite fine now (my knee has a plate and six screws). I am just glad that the driver stopped and called an ambulance!

turns.context: I had an extremely grueling spring semester this year. All said and done, I pulled 4 As and 2 Bs.

dialogue_history.utterance: Last semester was probably the largest challenge of my life. I go to school for electrical engineering, and I took 6 courses.

turns.context: I had an extremely grueling spring semester this year. All said and done, I pulled 4 As and 2 Bs.

dialogue_history.utterance: Last semester was probably the largest challenge of my life. I go to school for electrical engineering, and I took 6 courses.
that is a lot.. most i ever took at one time was 5 classes and i cried at least twice that semester.

turns.context: I took a job fixing a computer for a client who was leaving town. I had less than 24 hours to pull it off and was biting my nails.

dialogue_history.utterance: Waiting for something to come in the mail can send me in to a tizzy. It's even worse when it's parts I need to finish a computer repair job.

turns.context: I took a job fixing a computer for a client who was leaving town. I had less than 24 hours to pull it off and was biting my nails.

I did get it done in the end. It was a nail biter since the client was leaving the day after the parts came.

turns.context: Once, I was showing some people around the downtown area in my city. While at dinner, I soiled myself, and had to wash off in the sink in the small bathroom. An employee opened the door, and there I was, washing my pants.

dialogue_history.utterance: Have you ever lost control of your bowels as an adult?

turns.context: Once, I was showing some people around the downtown area in my city. While at dinner, I soiled myself, and had to wash off in the sink in the small bathroom. An employee opened the door, and there I was, washing my pants.

dialogue_history.utterance: Have you ever lost control of your bowels as an adult?
Oh, all the time. I've got to change my Depens three times a day.
Phew! I'm glad I am not the only one. Although for me, it happened in the middle of dinner at a small Vietnamese restaurant, and an employee walked in on me cleaning my pants in the sink!

turns.context: I was on a trip to a heavy metal festival in Las Vegas. While there, my girlfriend broke up with me, and we were still staying in the same room.

dialogue_history.utterance: I went to a heavy metal music festival in Las Vegas a few years ago! I had fun, but to be honest it was a bit of an emotional roller coaster.

turns.context: I was on a trip to a heavy metal festival in Las Vegas. While there, my girlfriend broke up with me, and we were still staying in the same room.

dialogue_history.utterance: I went to a heavy metal music festival in Las Vegas a few years ago! I had fun, but to be honest it was a bit of an emotional roller coaster.
Oh, I don't know why concerts make me feel a bit sentimental
I think it's because everybody can relate when it comes to live music. My girlfriend broke up with me the second day, but we had to stay in the same room.

turns.context: There was an event that I had a social obligation to attend and I was not looking forward to it. The day of, it rained out and I sat with my girlfriend watching the rain for hours.

dialogue_history.utterance: You know how sometimes things don't go as planned, but it feels like they turn out better in the end?

turns.context: There was an event that I had a social obligation to attend and I was not looking forward to it. The day of, it rained out and I sat with my girlfriend watching the rain for hours.

dialogue_history.utterance: You know how sometimes things don't go as planned, but it feels like they turn out better in the end?
Yes, some people call it fate.
You could call it that! I was supposed to go to a social event, but it got rained out and I ended up watching the rain for hours with my girlfriend.

turns.context: My father went to the hospital for abdominal pain. They found a tumor, but the operation to remove it went well. He passed away suddenly a few days after.

dialogue_history.utterance: My father was having abdominal pain, so he went to the hospital and they discovered a tumor.

turns.context: My father went to the hospital for abdominal pain. They found a tumor, but the operation to remove it went well. He passed away suddenly a few days after.

dialogue_history.utterance: My father was having abdominal pain, so he went to the hospital and they discovered a tumor.
Oh no, was it benign?
It was cancerous, but the surgery to remove it seemed to go well. A few days later he passed away suddenly, with no exact cause of death.

turns.context: When a new star wars movie comes out, a lot of kids (and adults to) dress up for the midnight premier. It reminds me of seeing Episode I for the first time, where me and a friend dressed up as a Jedi and a Sith.

dialogue_history.utterance: I love it when the new star wars movies come out, seeing all those kids (and adults) dress up for the theater really takes me back!

turns.context: Right after I had my baby, my husband was working second shift so he didn't get home until 2am. I was changing the baby's diaper and the changing table was right in front of a window. The front porch is right in front of that window. As I'm changing her diaper, I hear people running up and down the porch and banging on the walls. After that, I changed her diaper in the living room until my husband got home. I'm glad all the doors and windows were locked.

What did he want?  It's kinda scary when that happens, you never know what they want.
I was scared at first and then he hollered and pointed to the top of my car and I had left my purse on it. Boy, did my face get red.

turns.context: I remember a while back, being in Scotland for a while, and being so happy to be flying to California to see my then boyfriend. I hadn't felt so happy in years!

dialogue_history.utterance: I remember being in Scotland and arranging a trip to California to see my then boyfriend. I was so very happy to be seeing him again!
I bet! Is it hard to have a long distance relationship?

turns.context: Life hasn't always been easy, but I have many things to give thanks for. I try to remind myself of that every day, especially when I spend time with my family.

Yes, exactly. A friend was telling me they spent almost $300 a week on eating out. I don't even spend that much on groceries.

That's incredible if true, but I have trouble believing you for some reason. I was talking about some stranger who gave my friend 3 free tickets to a rock concert - we had such a blast!

dialogue_history.utterance: Ever seen a drone fly at night? It's far creepier than you might imagine at first, especially if it's in the early morning, like 3am or something.

dialogue_history.utterance: I knew that I needed to support my Uncle Bill when he told me he wanted to flee to Canada to escape military duty. Family always comes first.

I helped him pack the essentials in his wood-paneled station wagon and filled his gas tank for him. It was the least I could do.

turns.context: I was so elated to find out that my dog could speak to me! Even better, he has an adorable Cockney accent. We've been chatting about philosophy for three days now.

turns.context: My mother is always there for me and I know I can go to her with my darkest secrets. I feel like she is the one I know will never betray me.

dialogue_history.utterance: I had a secret and went to my mother to confide in her, as well as get off my chest. I know she would never betray my secret and can always count on her.

turns.context: My mother is always there for me and I know I can go to her with my darkest secrets. I feel like she is the one I know will never betray me.

dialogue_history.utterance: I had a secret and went to my mother to confide in her, as well as get off my chest. I know she would never betray my secret and can always count on her.
I am so happy for you that you have someone you can trust so completely.
Yes, I sure do! There aren't many people you can feel that way with and I am so grateful!

turns.context: A time that I felt uneasy and anxious was waiting for my son to find out if he was accepted to a prestigious college.

dialogue_history.utterance: My son applied to a prestigious college and the wait killed us. I was anxious and nervous waiting to see if he was accepted!

turns.context: A time that I felt uneasy and anxious was waiting for my son to find out if he was accepted to a prestigious college.

dialogue_history.utterance: My son applied to a prestigious college and the wait killed us. I was anxious and nervous waiting to see if he was accepted!
DID HE GET ACCEPTED? I HOPE SO
He did! He's in his 3rd year, going to be an Aerospace Engineer, so we are very proud of him.

turns.context: My sister passed away in 2010. She had taken her own life and my mother and I found her after she did. It was very traumatic and painful for us, and all our family.

dialogue_history.utterance: My sister passed away several years ago. She took her life, and my mother and I found her right after she did it. This was very painful, traumatic and hard for us all.

turns.context: My sister passed away in 2010. She had taken her own life and my mother and I found her after she did. It was very traumatic and painful for us, and all our family.

dialogue_history.utterance: My sister passed away several years ago. She took her life, and my mother and I found her right after she did it. This was very painful, traumatic and hard for us all.
oh wow, how did your mother handle this, how did you handle it . i can only imagine the pain.
It didn't really seem to sink in for my mother for awhile, she was in denial. But, it was so hard when it did. I went into a depression for awhile, as she was my only sibling and we were very close.

turns.context: I felt so much love and affection when my son was moving to college. It was hard, as I wasn't ready, but was so proud of him!

dialogue_history.utterance: When my son first started college, I felt so much love and affection, but it was definitely hard to see him go! I was very proud though.

turns.context: I felt so much love and affection when my son was moving to college. It was hard, as I wasn't ready, but was so proud of him!

dialogue_history.utterance: When my son first started college, I felt so much love and affection, but it was definitely hard to see him go! I was very proud though.
where did he go study at? i can imagine how hard that could be. but it's good to see him following his dreams
He went to the University of Alabama in Huntsville. It's focused on science, engineering, etc. He's going to be an Aerospace Engineer. It's great to see him go for his dreams!

turns.context: When we went to the beach for vacation a few weeks ago, I felt so relaxed and happy! It was so great to spend that time with my family.

dialogue_history.utterance: We went on vacation a few weeks ago and went to the beach, It was so relaxing and great. I really enjoyed the time with my family.

turns.context: When we went to the beach for vacation a few weeks ago, I felt so relaxed and happy! It was so great to spend that time with my family.

dialogue_history.utterance: We went on vacation a few weeks ago and went to the beach, It was so relaxing and great. I really enjoyed the time with my family.
aww that's amazing, i am going on vacation next week and i can't wait
That's great! I'm sure you earned it, just like we do. It's so good to get some time away from the hustle and bustle of life!

turns.context: My husband has been out of town for a few weeks on business but is coming back next week. I am anxious and looking forward to when he gets home!

dialogue_history.utterance: I am looking forward to next week! My husband has been out of town on business for several weeks and comes home next weekend!

turns.context: My husband has been out of town for a few weeks on business but is coming back next week. I am anxious and looking forward to when he gets home!

dialogue_history.utterance: I am looking forward to next week! My husband has been out of town on business for several weeks and comes home next weekend!
Do you have any special welcome-back events planned?
I am going to cook a special meal and see if he wants to go out, just us two. I know he will like that.

turns.context: I have a surprise planned for a night out for my husband when he gets back from traveling for work. I feel pretty optimistic and sure he will really enjoy it.

dialogue_history.utterance: My husband has been out of town a few weeks for work but is coming back next weekend. I have a surprise night planned for just us. I am optimistic and sure he will really enjoy it.

turns.context: I have a surprise planned for a night out for my husband when he gets back from traveling for work. I feel pretty optimistic and sure he will really enjoy it.

dialogue_history.utterance: My husband has been out of town a few weeks for work but is coming back next weekend. I have a surprise night planned for just us. I am optimistic and sure he will really enjoy it.
How exciting! I hope everything goes as planned!
Thanks! We've been married almost 23 years but I try to keep things fun and spend time together.

turns.context: I was feeling a bit nostalgic the other day when my son went back to college. It made me think of him when he first started Kindergarten.

dialogue_history.utterance: My son went back to college recently and it had me feeling a bit nostalgic. I could just picture him starting Kindergarten and it seemed not so long ago!

turns.context: I was feeling a bit nostalgic the other day when my son went back to college. It made me think of him when he first started Kindergarten.

dialogue_history.utterance: My son went back to college recently and it had me feeling a bit nostalgic. I could just picture him starting Kindergarten and it seemed not so long ago!
aww. im sure you must feel proud of him
Yes, very. But, time sure has flown by with him growing up. I can just see his little blonde head when he was 5 and just starting school!

turns.context: When I was promoted to Team Leader, I had years of experience and felt very comfortable in my ability to perform the job. I was very ready for the leadership role!

dialogue_history.utterance: I was promoted to a Team Leader and I felt very secure I could do well at the job. I had years of experience and was ready for a leadership role.

turns.context: When I was promoted to Team Leader, I had years of experience and felt very comfortable in my ability to perform the job. I was very ready for the leadership role!

dialogue_history.utterance: I was promoted to a Team Leader and I felt very secure I could do well at the job. I had years of experience and was ready for a leadership role.
that is good news. its always good when what you learn helps you get ahead
Yes, thank you! I had worked very hard through the years, and I felt that I earned it, and would do well at it.

turns.context: One day a back neighbor insulted my 10 year old son and made fun of him for his weight. She actually called him a name and cursed. Needless to say, I was so mad, beyond angry!

dialogue_history.utterance: There was an incident where one of my back neighbors called my young son a name and made fun of him. I was so mad, beyond angry!

turns.context: One day a back neighbor insulted my 10 year old son and made fun of him for his weight. She actually called him a name and cursed. Needless to say, I was so mad, beyond angry!

dialogue_history.utterance: There was an incident where one of my back neighbors called my young son a name and made fun of him. I was so mad, beyond angry!
An adult did this?

Yes, and she had two children of her own, similar in age. Her son also weighed more than mine! She did it because my son rode his bike through the corner of her yard as rode around the circle, that made her mad! Can you believe that??

turns.context: Last week was the first day of school for my granddaughter. She didn't go to preschool so I was really worried how she would like it and if she would be sad or not. Turns out she loves it and I was worried for nothing.

dialogue_history.utterance: Last week my granddaughter started school for the first time. I worried about her the entire day.

turns.context: Last week was the first day of school for my granddaughter. She didn't go to preschool so I was really worried how she would like it and if she would be sad or not. Turns out she loves it and I was worried for nothing.

dialogue_history.utterance: Last week my granddaughter started school for the first time. I worried about her the entire day.
Aww, they grow up so fast!!  How did she do?
It turns out she loves it and I was a mess for 8 hours for nothing.

turns.context: I plan for weeks every time we go on vacation and make sure we have everything we need. I didn't do very well when we went on our honeymoon though. I guess I was so excited about the wedding that I forgot just about everything.

dialogue_history.utterance: I always try and plan everything in advance to bring everything we need when we go on vacation. We recently went on our honeymoon and I didn't do very well this time. Ugh!

turns.context: I plan for weeks every time we go on vacation and make sure we have everything we need. I didn't do very well when we went on our honeymoon though. I guess I was so excited about the wedding that I forgot just about everything.

dialogue_history.utterance: I always try and plan everything in advance to bring everything we need when we go on vacation. We recently went on our honeymoon and I didn't do very well this time. Ugh!
What went wrong?
I forgot everything. I guess I was so excited about the wedding, I totally failed at packing this time. Oh well, it was still fun.

turns.context: My friend's boyfriend had the nerve to kiss me when I was visiting her one day. It was an out of the blue, sneaky move and repulsed me!

dialogue_history.utterance: One day I was visiting a friend and her boyfriend came up and kissed me, while I was waiting for my friend to return from another room! It was sneaky and repulsed me!

turns.context: My friend's boyfriend had the nerve to kiss me when I was visiting her one day. It was an out of the blue, sneaky move and repulsed me!

dialogue_history.utterance: One day I was visiting a friend and her boyfriend came up and kissed me, while I was waiting for my friend to return from another room! It was sneaky and repulsed me!
I understand. Did you told your friend?

I didn't....only because of her situation. She had custody of her very ill and handicapped infant grandson, she wasn't working so depended on him financially and she was very much in love with him. She already suspected he was with other women, and stayed.....

turns.context: The other night I was home alone and it was late. All of a sudden, I heard someone knocking at the door really loud and they wouldn't stop. I ignored it but I was so scared and about to call the police but they finally stopped and went away.

dialogue_history.utterance: The other night I was home alone and all of a sudden I heard someone knocking at the door really loud and they wouldn't stop. I was so scared.

turns.context: The other night I was home alone and it was late. All of a sudden, I heard someone knocking at the door really loud and they wouldn't stop. I ignored it but I was so scared and about to call the police but they finally stopped and went away.

dialogue_history.utterance: The other night I was home alone and all of a sudden I heard someone knocking at the door really loud and they wouldn't stop. I was so scared.
Did you go see who it was?
No, I ignored them and they finally went away. I was just about to call the police before they left though. I hope that doesn't happen again.

turns.context: My 50th birthday just passed. I was trying to ignore it but my family ended up having a surprise party for me. It was such a happy night. Made me realize I should embrace my age and not ignore it.

dialogue_history.utterance: I was trying to ignore the fact that my 50th birthday was coming up but my family decided to throw me a surprise party.

turns.context: My 50th birthday just passed. I was trying to ignore it but my family ended up having a surprise party for me. It was such a happy night. Made me realize I should embrace my age and not ignore it.

dialogue_history.utterance: I was trying to ignore the fact that my 50th birthday was coming up but my family decided to throw me a surprise party.
That is great. What is it fun?
It was so much fun and such a happy night. I'm trying to embrace my age now and not ignore it any more

turns.context: My husband and I had an argument a few weeks ago. I got pretty mad and said some things I wished I hadn't. I felt bad and disappointed in my actions afterwards.

dialogue_history.utterance: A few weeks ago, my husband and I had a big argument. I said some pretty hurtful things, and wished I hadn't. I felt very bad and disappointed in myself afterwards.

turns.context: My husband and I had an argument a few weeks ago. I got pretty mad and said some things I wished I hadn't. I felt bad and disappointed in my actions afterwards.

dialogue_history.utterance: A few weeks ago, my husband and I had a big argument. I said some pretty hurtful things, and wished I hadn't. I felt very bad and disappointed in myself afterwards.
I am single and never been married. I assume arguments are part of marriage.
Yes, that's true. I tend to be a bit more verbal on my end and say things I regret later.

turns.context: One night my children and I came home and came in through the back door. As I opened it, I saw a tall shadow in the hallway! It scared me so much, as I feared an intruder was in my home.

dialogue_history.utterance: One night when my kids and I came home, I saw a shadow in my hallway as I came in the back door. I was so scared and was afraid someone had broken in my home.

turns.context: One night my children and I came home and came in through the back door. As I opened it, I saw a tall shadow in the hallway! It scared me so much, as I feared an intruder was in my home.

dialogue_history.utterance: One night when my kids and I came home, I saw a shadow in my hallway as I came in the back door. I was so scared and was afraid someone had broken in my home.
In some ways that is a bit funny but it certainly can be a scary time to come home alone to an empty dark house.
Yes, and I live out in the country so I wouldn't get a quick response time from emergency vehicles. But, luckily, it turned out to be my shadow!

turns.context: One day I was a bit short on cash so I didn't give a homeless man any money. I felt really bad, as I always try to give something to those that are in need.

dialogue_history.utterance: There was a day that I was a bit short on cash on hand and I didn't give money to a homeless man. I usually always do, as I feel it's my part to help those in need, as I am blessed. I felt very bad that I didn't that day.

turns.context: One day I was a bit short on cash so I didn't give a homeless man any money. I felt really bad, as I always try to give something to those that are in need.

dialogue_history.utterance: There was a day that I was a bit short on cash on hand and I didn't give money to a homeless man. I usually always do, as I feel it's my part to help those in need, as I am blessed. I felt very bad that I didn't that day.
I don't think you should feel too bad about missing one day!  It sounds like you're generous regularly.  I get it though.
Well, homeless people aren't common in my area, so that's why I felt a bit bad about it.

turns.context: When my children were born, it was such a wonderful and amazing occasion for me. It's a happiness beyond words.

dialogue_history.utterance: When my children were born, it was a rejoicing time for me. I can't think of a time I felt more happiness.

turns.context: When my children were born, it was such a wonderful and amazing occasion for me. It's a happiness beyond words.

dialogue_history.utterance: When my children were born, it was a rejoicing time for me. I can't think of a time I felt more happiness.
Children are a beautiful thing for us parents. What a great memory you have of that.
Yes, I have two children and I feel so blessed to have them. I lucked out and got a boy and girl, both healthy, smart and wonderful.

turns.context: I have been true to my beliefs for a very long time, even if it means disagreeing with others. I used to work in a place where everyone had different beliefs to me. I just had to walk away from conversations on occasion.

dialogue_history.utterance: I used to work in a place where all my colleagues had different believes to myself. I wanted to stay true to what I believed in, so had to walk away from conversations on many occasions.

turns.context: I have been true to my beliefs for a very long time, even if it means disagreeing with others. I used to work in a place where everyone had different beliefs to me. I just had to walk away from conversations on occasion.

dialogue_history.utterance: I used to work in a place where all my colleagues had different believes to myself. I wanted to stay true to what I believed in, so had to walk away from conversations on many occasions.
In what do you believe?
Just that all people should be given an equal chance in life and that no one type of person is better than another, just because of their religion or skin color, or where they come from.

turns.context: I did not have a car for a few years and just recently bought a new one. I was scared to drive at first, especially on the highways around here. People drive like crazy people and didn't want to get in another accident. I am getting used to it now though.

dialogue_history.utterance: I recently bought a new car after not driving for several years and I was really scared to drive it, especially on the highway.

turns.context: I did not have a car for a few years and just recently bought a new one. I was scared to drive at first, especially on the highways around here. People drive like crazy people and didn't want to get in another accident. I am getting used to it now though.

dialogue_history.utterance: I recently bought a new car after not driving for several years and I was really scared to drive it, especially on the highway.
What car did you buy?
Just a Honda Civic. People drive crazy around here. I don't want to have another car accident like the last one.

turns.context: I decided to join to group to lose weight. I had so much respect and admired what all of these people were going through with their struggle. It really helped having their support too.

dialogue_history.utterance: I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.

turns.context: I decided to join to group to lose weight. I had so much respect and admired what all of these people were going through with their struggle. It really helped having their support too.

dialogue_history.utterance: I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.
Good luck! My sister-in-law has been with weight watchers for a while now. She loves the camaraderie and how everyone encourages each other.
It has really helped to have their support. I am so grateful for them.

turns.context: I'm from Scotland originally and had to apply to become a US citizen. To do that, you have to pass a Civics test. I was soooo nervous!

dialogue_history.utterance: A few years ago I applied for US citizenship. To succeed you have to pass a Civics test. I was so terribly nervous!

turns.context: I'm from Scotland originally and had to apply to become a US citizen. To do that, you have to pass a Civics test. I was soooo nervous!

dialogue_history.utterance: A few years ago I applied for US citizenship. To succeed you have to pass a Civics test. I was so terribly nervous!
That test seems so hard. I probably couldn't even pass it. How did you do?
I passed! Turns out you only had to answer three questions correctly. But they have 50 to choose from so you have to study the lot!

turns.context: I was running to get in the store because it was raining. I slipped and fell on the wet floor as I entered the store.

dialogue_history.utterance: When I was entering the store it was really slippery.

turns.context: I was running to get in the store because it was raining. I slipped and fell on the wet floor as I entered the store.

dialogue_history.utterance: When I was entering the store it was really slippery.
Why was it slippery
It had been raining, so I ran across the parking lot into the store. I slid about 3 feet.

turns.context: I found out that my best friend was lying to her husband but I kept her secret.

dialogue_history.utterance: I am feeling a bit guilty about keeping a secret for my friend.

turns.context: I found out that my best friend was lying to her husband but I kept her secret.

dialogue_history.utterance: I am feeling a bit guilty about keeping a secret for my friend.
Oh no. Why are you keeping the secret?
I don't want to out her to her husband, usually the only thing that happens is they drop the friend.

turns.context: I really wanted to get the part in the school rendition of a play. But my friend got it.

dialogue_history.utterance: I feel kind of blue today, they announced the parts for the annual play.

turns.context: I really wanted to get the part in the school rendition of a play. But my friend got it.

dialogue_history.utterance: I feel kind of blue today, they announced the parts for the annual play.
Oh I am sorry. Did you get any part?
I did, and it is a good one, just not the one that I wanted. I didn't want the lead or anything.

turns.context: My house is a mess and I've got people coming over later this evening.

dialogue_history.utterance: My house is a mess and I've got people coming over later on this evening.

turns.context: My house is a mess and I've got people coming over later this evening.

dialogue_history.utterance: My house is a mess and I've got people coming over later on this evening.
That can be overwhelming. Are you going to be cleaning all day then?
I'm going to try to. If worst comes to worse, I'll just toss everything in my back bedroom, shiny up the floors and hope for the best! *chuckle*

turns.context: My son was in advanced placement and honors class in high school...

dialogue_history.utterance: My son was in advance placement and honors during high school. He went to a prestigious college after, going for as an Aerospace Engineer. He never ceases to astonish me with his intelligence and admire me with how hard he works to pursue his dreams.

turns.context: My son was in advanced placement and honors class in high school...

dialogue_history.utterance: My son was in advance placement and honors during high school. He went to a prestigious college after, going for as an Aerospace Engineer. He never ceases to astonish me with his intelligence and admire me with how hard he works to pursue his dreams.
Wow! It sounds like your kid is quite smart and gifted! You must be really proud of him!
I am quite proud, thank you! I also have a teenage daughter that is very smart and an amazing artist, (which I don't know where she gets that talent). They really impress me with amazing they are!

turns.context: Going out today to learn a new route for my job and hoping I don't get lost.

dialogue_history.utterance: Going out today to learn a new route for my job and I'm hoping that I don't get lost.

turns.context: Going out today to learn a new route for my job and hoping I don't get lost.

dialogue_history.utterance: Going out today to learn a new route for my job and I'm hoping that I don't get lost.
Are you able to learn the route first before you have to take it for your job or are they kind of just throwing you into it?
I got the assignment yesterday, and I told myself that I'd go drive around it today and tomorrow.  My boss is supposed to ride along with me the first week, and then after that I'll be on my own.

turns.context: I recently purchased an Xbox! I've never owned a gaming console

dialogue_history.utterance: I just bought an Xbox! I've never owned a gaming console before

turns.context: I recently purchased an Xbox! I've never owned a gaming console

dialogue_history.utterance: I just bought an Xbox! I've never owned a gaming console before
Excellent! Are you enjoying it?
I am! I bought Halo and am ready to ride.

turns.context: My mother lives in the same neighborhood as I do and I am so happy she lives close. My father passed away about 2 years ago and I'm so thankful she's still here with us.

dialogue_history.utterance: My father passed away 2 years ago, but my mother lives in my neighborhood now. I'm so thankful she lives close by and still here with us. She's such a wonderful mother.

turns.context: My mother lives in the same neighborhood as I do and I am so happy she lives close. My father passed away about 2 years ago and I'm so thankful she's still here with us.

dialogue_history.utterance: My father passed away 2 years ago, but my mother lives in my neighborhood now. I'm so thankful she lives close by and still here with us. She's such a wonderful mother.
I am glad that she is living close to you. That must make you feel special. My mom is dead so I understand how you feel.
I'm sorry to hear that, I know it's so hard to lose a parent. I think we take them for granted when we are younger, but I am blessed she's still here.

turns.context: My upstairs neighbors are away for the weekend and I am as happy as a clam. No thumping, screeching, playing loud video games. Heaven!

dialogue_history.utterance: I am as happy as a clam right now. My neighbors are away for the weekend!

turns.context: My upstairs neighbors are away for the weekend and I am as happy as a clam. No thumping, screeching, playing loud video games. Heaven!

dialogue_history.utterance: I am as happy as a clam right now. My neighbors are away for the weekend!
are they typically bad or something?
The live upstairs and constantly thump around, screeching into their cellphones. And then there's the video games...

turns.context: My good friend came over last night! It was shocking since he lives hours away

dialogue_history.utterance: My friend from across the continent came over yesterday! I was so happy about it

turns.context: My good friend came over last night! It was shocking since he lives hours away

dialogue_history.utterance: My friend from across the continent came over yesterday! I was so happy about it
Thats awesome. What did you guys do?
We ended up hanging out and recording some audio. He is a voice actor

turns.context: While out walking in a Boston suburb, we heard some animal cries. It turned out to be a baby kitten (very young) in a window well, with not identifying information. We took it home and adopted it.

Poor thing! What did you do? Did you take it home with you?
We actually did, and ended up adopting him. He was still so young he needed formula, but now he is thriving!

turns.context: When a baby bird was alone

dialogue_history.utterance: I felt a need to help when the baby bird was by itself

turns.context: When a baby bird was alone

dialogue_history.utterance: I felt a need to help when the baby bird was by itself
That's nice of you. Did you keep it as a pet

turns.context: Waiting for my results

dialogue_history.utterance: Waiting to see if I would graduate was pretty unnerving

turns.context: Waiting for my results

dialogue_history.utterance: Waiting to see if I would graduate was pretty unnerving
That is a nerve-racking experience. But I'm betting you did graduate and did just fine!
Yep, had to take a class online over the summer but it worked out

turns.context: I forgot my mother-in-laws birthday this year and can't look her in the eye!

dialogue_history.utterance: I forgot my mother-in-law's birthday this year and can't look her in the eye!

turns.context: I forgot my mother-in-laws birthday this year and can't look her in the eye!

dialogue_history.utterance: I forgot my mother-in-law's birthday this year and can't look her in the eye!
I'm sure she understands, just tell the truth!
I just feel so embarrassed - she never forgets my birthday. And my husband was away and didn't remind me :(

turns.context: Wearing pajamas to a party

dialogue_history.utterance: I was the only one wearing pajamas at this party, not my greatest moment

turns.context: Wearing pajamas to a party

dialogue_history.utterance: I was the only one wearing pajamas at this party, not my greatest moment

I thought that it was a pajama party haha, never worn a dress before, maybe that's the secret

turns.context: Having nightmares when I was little was scary

dialogue_history.utterance: I had some trippy nightmares as a kid, now I don't really have dreams

turns.context: Having nightmares when I was little was scary

dialogue_history.utterance: I had some trippy nightmares as a kid, now I don't really have dreams
Oh man, I did too. I still do every once in a while but only when I'm having trouble sleeping. Does one stand out from the rest that you remember vividly?
Yeah, it was like I was tied to a chair and a huge thing was staring at me, pretty weird

turns.context: When I stole from a store I felt bad

dialogue_history.utterance: I didn't realize that stealing was bad until I realized how it made me feel afterwards

dialogue_history.utterance: I didn't realize that stealing was bad until I realized how it made me feel afterwards
So you probably felt pretty guilty huh. Did you return what you stole?
No, I was scared to get charged, but I stopped after that

turns.context: At a meditation retreat I felt better than ever

dialogue_history.utterance: I was at a meditation retreat last year for 10 days and I can say that I experienced a better feeling there than I could ever remember.

turns.context: At a meditation retreat I felt better than ever

dialogue_history.utterance: I was at a meditation retreat last year for 10 days and I can say that I experienced a better feeling there than I could ever remember.
I've always liked the idea of meditation, but I feel like it'd be hard. My mind is always racing!
